overview: A young boy from a remote Maharashtrian village has an unusually large pocket stitched onto his school shirt, to safeguard his most precious belongingsâ€”petals, coins and marbles. Proud of his unique new accoutrement, the child is set above his peers, but his status becomes a bone of contention amongst the village elders. So unfurls a tragic tale of lost innocence and coming of age.
title: KHISA
